head.title: LIMIT REMOVED ON STEEL MAKER SHARES

hedline.hl1: LIMIT REMOVED ON STEEL MAKER SHARES

abstract.p: South Korean government, hoping to increase declining share price of Pohang Iron and Steel Co, world's largest steel maker, will eliminate 30 percent stock ownership and 3 percent individual share-holding limit in company this month instead of next year; Pohang's share price gains 3.2 percent (S)

block.p: Hoping to increase the declining share price of the Pohang Iron and Steel Company, the world's largest steel maker, the South Korean government will eliminate the 30 percent foreign stock ownership and 3 percent individual share-holding limit in the company this month instead of next year, the Ministry of Commerce, Industry and Energy said. Pohang's share price gained 3.2 percent. The shares had fallen 11 percent over the previous three days to the lowest level this year.
